text: The 2002 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship ==Qualification== *Scandinavian Final (Semi-Final A): **May 25, 2002 ** Elgane *Semi-Final B: **May 30, 2002 ** Olching *Semi-Final C: **June 2, 2002 ** Daugavpils ==Final== *August 25, 2002 * Daugavpils, Spidveja Centrs ==See also== 2002 Euro I J
title: 2002 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
